Generate Final .bib File of References Reviewed

Adam H. Sparks

2020-05-01

Source: vignettes/d_generate_final_bib.Rmd
d_generate_final_bib.Rmd

Generate Final .bib File of References Reviewed

This file generates a .bib file of the references that were reviewed. Unfortunately not all references have a DOI and not DOIs resolve properly, so some manual intervention was required after the creation of the file.

Some of the original references were not suitable when we began to review them, so we selected new references. Therefore, for this work, we will download the notes from Google Drive and use the DOIs from them.

ref <- gsheet::gsheet2tbl(
    "docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19gXobV4oPZeWZiQJAPNIrmqpfGQtpapXWcSxaXRw1-M/#gid=1699540381"
  )

There are eight articles that do not have a DOI, remove them. They will be added manually to the resulting “references_reviewed_for_check.bib” file.

# remove the 15 articles with no DOI
ref <- ref[!is.na(ref$doi), ]

Using sapply(), fetch the DOIs using crossref::cr_cn() and generate a .bib object in R.

bib <- sapply(ref$doi, rcrossref::cr_cn)

Save the resulting .bib file for checking using JabRef and completion, filling in the entries for journals that do not provide DOIs.

sink(file = file.path("inst/extdata/references_reviewed_for_check.bib"))
writeLines(unlist(lapply(bib, paste, collapse = " ")))
sink()
